metadata.title: CVE-2024-23305 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: An out-of-bounds write vulnerability exists in the BrainVisionMarkerParsing functionality of The Biosig Project libbiosig 2.5.0 and MasterBranch (ab0ee111). A specially crafted .vmrk file can lead to arbitrarycode execution. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger thisvulnerability.

criterions.comment: biosig package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
